com.cmput301w18t05.taskzilla.request

Class RequestManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.content.BroadcastReceiver
      • com.cmput301w18t05.taskzilla.request.RequestManager

  • public class RequestManager
extends android.content.BroadcastReceiver
    RequestManager SINGLETON Created by wyatt on 07/03/18. Abstraction for handling request objects i.e backlog requests when app is not connected to ElasticSearch server.

        public void invokeRequest(Request request)
        activities should call this method when wanting to execute a new request. request manager will handle the logic of offline/online connectivity.
        Parameters:
